settings.content: Multiple currencies (new Shopify feature) can be enabled as described in the [documentation](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup). Such currencies selector is allowed [not for all countries](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/shopify-payments-requirements#can-i-use-shopify-payments)
You must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
